title: It’s always worth reading Timothy Snyder on fascism: The Shamans (SCOTUS) and...
content: It’s always worth reading Timothy Snyder on fascism: The Shamans (SCOTUS) and the Chieftain (Trump). “To contemplate ‘presidential immunity,’ as the shamans are now doing, is to cast aside the rule of law and summon up the ghost of revenge culture.”
author: Jason Kottke
